item.title: Reviving Maintainerati
item.description: Maintainerati is a one-day Open Space unconference for open source maintainers. February 2017 saw a group of open source maintainers gathered at GitHubâ€™s HQ in San Francisco, an event then repeated in London and Amsterdam. Maintainers left these events feeling both inspired and empowered. During these events, one important thing we learned is that maintainers need to have access to others who are sharing the same experiences, struggles and successes they have while running an open source project.
